title: [CANCELLED] Server Maintenance - 19/02/2015 @ 0500 AEST
body:
** Due to some unforeseen issues, this maintenance has been cancelled **

Summoners

We'll be doing some planned maintenance at tomorrow morning - **0500 AEDT 19th Feb**, to some of our platform infrastructure.  No impact to gameplay is expected, however we have scheduled this to happen while ranked is offline, just to be safe.

There will be a ticker in the client during the maintenance, and we will keep the [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) updated to keep you informed.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: This maintenance has been rescheduled to happen at 0500 on the 19th Feb.

i got punished for being afk because i got kicked out of the game due to this issue X((((
now i have to wait 10 minutes each game for the next five games :((((((

please what can i do? who can i talk with to solve this problem??? it is not my fault

It sucks that you had this issue, but this maintenance was actually cancelled, so it would not have affected your gameplay at that time.  

Additionally, the LeaverBuster system will put you in low priority queues only after multiple offences.  Are you being disconnected from games a lot?

11.38 GMT 19/02/2015 here on EUW
Game was fine till about 10 minutes ago.
Then I was disconnected and managed to reconnect.
Then 2 other players left due to being disconnected.
And now I've been disconnected again and it wont let me log back on.

Hi,

This is actually the board for the OCE server - the maintenance referred to was for OCE only (and got cancelled).  If you are having connection problems, it might be a good idea to post this on the EUW boards.

Cheers!
Mindstar
i have the same Problem .....was in Game about 30 mins. We did Baron in this time, me and another one had a dc. Now i can´t connect to riot Server =(
Ty i got a message that telled me to accept not to leave any game!! This is not fair!

wtf i got punished for being afk because i got kicked out of the game due to this issue X((((
now i have to wait 10 minutes each game for the next five games :((((((

please what can i do? who can i talk with to solve this problem??? it is not my fault

Thanks for resolving the Problem that fast. If i could i would honor you. 
no sarkasm. < 3
Finally Rito finally
Disconnected and lost a ranked game. We were destroying the enemy team before all of us disconnected. It didn't even say loss prevented. Rito pls{{champion:6}}
And what makes you sure that your enemy isnt disconnect?

Our whole team disconnected, i looked on our enemy Lux's profile and seems she was the only person that didn't disconnect on the enemy team. Looks like she just pushed 'til Nexus by herself{{champion:99}}  Lux  OP.
lol honor lux XD... the same has happened to me btw :/

Your whole Team disconnected and your enemys have had an Lux that pushed 'til Nexux by herself? 
Lux Buff i guess. 

{{champion:99}} Lux: 

*"We are aware that Lux fell out of the Game and is picked way to less, We thought to make her more viable, we will give her Ultimate some changes. This will show the difference between a better and a worse Lux-player."*

Changes: "Final Spark"

*NEW*: Lux Ultimate "Final Spark" Now causes an disconnect of all players but her.
Still can't sign in ...
wow LOL's servers are down. WHAT A SURPRISE...

You are acting like this happens every day. I play many LoL and i can't say the Servers are (unexpected) down often. 
Just stay patient and it will work up for the next half year.
the game client is not working?
hes scanning other 10.000 files is normal?
For me it just doesn't connect to the server. I guess we just need to wait until the servers come back up
2 friends are online. Not all have this Problem =(
Yeah, it's a bit weird :/

Hey, people. Got the problem that i cant join into the Client. It says "Did not receive a response from the Server". Does it have something to do with whatever you are doing or is that a problem with my options? I don't know. would be nice if you could help me.
You should wait till Riot gets the server s back online I think because you seen your not the only Person waiting :)

well, it said in the Launcher eu west is online cause of that i was confused. but if it isnt online right now, there is no prob to me. Just needed to know 'cause it wouldnt have been the first time my properties changed somehow and i cant join a game cause of that.
Thx dude.

Now there stands that in the Clien : 'Network Operations – 3 minutes ago
Currently we're seeing issues with players getting disconnected from Games. We're working to fix this and will provide further updates on this page.' so I guess that's it
Lost my ranked game and 16pl lost and no compensation... nice servor EUW
GG %%%% EUW again it's only our Sever thank you Riot I lost my Ranked Game because of you guys :) !
